trans-unit.source: Configure IIS Express for local testing of Mobile Service
trans-unit.target: Configure IIS Express for local testing of Mobile Service

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure IIS Express to allow connections to a local mobile service project for testing.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure IIS Express to allow connections to a local mobile service project for testing.

trans-unit.source: Configure the local web server to allow connections to a local mobile service
trans-unit.target: Configure the local web server to allow connections to a local mobile service

trans-unit.source: Azure Mobile Services enables you create your mobile service in Visual Studio using one of the supported .NET languages and then publish it to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure Mobile Services enables you create your mobile service in Visual Studio using one of the supported .NET languages and then publish it to Azure.

trans-unit.source: One of the major benefits of using a .NET backend for your mobile service is the ability to run, test, and debug the mobile service on your local computer or virtual machine before publishing it to Azure.
trans-unit.target: One of the major benefits of using a .NET backend for your mobile service is the ability to run, test, and debug the mobile service on your local computer or virtual machine before publishing it to Azure.

trans-unit.source: To be able to test a mobile service locally with clients running on an emulator, virtual machine or on a separate workstation, you have to configure the local Web server and host computer to allow connections to the workstation's IP address and port.
trans-unit.target: To be able to test a mobile service locally with clients running on an emulator, virtual machine or on a separate workstation, you have to configure the local Web server and host computer to allow connections to the workstation's IP address and port.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to configure IIS Express to enable connections to your locally hosted mobile service.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to configure IIS Express to enable connections to your locally hosted mobile service.
